records.Name: Example Type A
records.Descr__c:
Example Type A Record - includes No Value, Valid Value and Type A variant.

(Does not show Type B variants)

records.Name: Example Master
records.Descr__c:
Example Master Record - only shows No Value and Valid Value.

(A and B variants are not shown)

records.Name: Example Type B
records.Descr__c:
Example Type B Record - includes No Value, Valid Value and Type B variant.

(Does not show Type A variants)
